events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is not what I paid for.
The system identified this case as a refund request based on the customer's message indicating dissatisfaction and money back.
A customer support agent from the refunds team has been assigned to handle this refund inquiry to ensure appropriate follow-up.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund for an incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to help us process your refund faster?
Sure, my order number is 987654321 and I attached a photo of the wrong product I got instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We have initiated your refund, which should be credited to your original payment method within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and refund process. I appreciate your help resolving this issue promptly.
We are glad that your refund request was handled satisfactorily. Please contact us if you need any further assistance.
We are following up to confirm that you received your refund successfully and to check if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since no further issues have been reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for reaching out and have a great day!
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey to help us improve our service in the future.
